title: MA61035: Queuing - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Probability and StatisticsMarkov chains, Poisson process, birth-death Process, Simple Markovian queuing models - M/M/1, M/M/1/N, M/M/C, transient behaviour of M/M/1 and M/M/1/N queue. Models with general arrival or service - M/G/1, GI/M/1. Concept bulk queues, network of Markovian queues. General concept of discrete time queues, system reliability, Markovian models in reliability theory. Life testing using the exponential and Weibull models. Elementary inventory models, deterministic and stochastic models, inventory models with price breaks, concept of just-in-time inventory.
